description.english: endless to go. Kill your first zombie.
description.german: Noch unendlich viele vor dir. Töte deinen ersten Zombie.
description.french: Et ce n’est que le début. Tuez votre premier zombie.
description.spanish: y las que te quedan. Mata a tu primer zombie.
description.schinese: 才刚开始。击杀你的第一个僵尸。
description.russian: Впереди — бесконечность. Убей своего первого зомби.
description.portuguese: E ainda agora começou. Elimina o teu primeiro zombie.
description.brazilian: E ainda tem muito chão. Mate seu primeiro zumbi.

description.english: Reach round 10.
description.french: Atteignez la manche 10.
description.spanish: Llega a la ronda 10.
description.russian: Достигни 10-й волны.
description.portuguese: Chega à ronda 10.
description.brazilian: Chegue à rodada 10.
description.german: Erreiche Runde 10.

displayName.english: This is not just a game
displayName.portuguese: Isto não é só um jogo
displayName.brazilian: Isto não é só um jogo
displayName.german: Das ist mehr als nur ein Spiel

description.english: Reach round 30.
description.spanish: Llega a la ronda 30.
description.russian: Достигни 30-й волны.
description.french: Atteignez la manche 30.
description.portuguese: Chega à ronda 30.
description.brazilian: Chegue à rodada 30.
description.german: Erreiche Runde 30.

description.english: Reach round 115.
description.spanish: Llega a la ronda 115.
description.russian: Достигни 115-й волны.
description.french: Atteignez la manche 115.
description.portuguese: Chega à ronda 115.
description.brazilian: Chegue à rodada 115.
description.german: Erreiche Runde 115.

description.english: Survive a full round (after round 10) without taking damage.
description.spanish: Sobrevive una ronda completa (después de la ronda 10) sin recibir daño.
description.russian: Выживи целую волну (после 10-й), не получив урона.
description.french: Survivez à une manche complète (après la 10) sans subir de dégâts.
description.schinese: 在第10回合之后完整存活一轮且不受伤。
description.portuguese: Sobrevive a uma ronda inteira (após a 10) sem sofrer dano.
description.brazilian: Sobreviva a uma rodada completa (após a 10) sem sofrer dano.
description.german: Überlebe eine komplette Runde (nach Runde 10), ohne Schaden zu nehmen.

description.english: Reach round 10 without opening any door.
description.spanish: Alcanza la ronda 10 sin abrir ninguna puerta.
description.russian: Достигни 10-й волны, не открыв ни одной двери.
description.french: Atteignez la manche 10 sans ouvrir aucune porte.
description.schinese: 在不打开任何门的情况下达到第10回合。
description.portuguese: Chega à ronda 10 sem abrir nenhuma porta.
description.brazilian: Chegue à rodada 10 sem abrir nenhuma porta.
description.german: Erreiche Runde 10, ohne eine Tür zu öffnen.

description.english: Activate the power.
description.spanish: Activa la electricidad.
description.russian: Включи электричество.
description.french: Activez le courant.
description.portuguese: Ativa a eletricidade.
description.brazilian: Ative a energia.
description.german: Aktiviere den Strom.

description.english: Survive with just the knife until round 10.
description.spanish: Sobrevive hasta la ronda 10 solo con el cuchillo.
description.russian: Продержись с одним ножом до 10-й волны.
description.french: Survivez uniquement avec le couteau jusqu’à la manche 10.
description.portuguese: Só com a faca até à ronda 10.
description.brazilian: Sobreviva só com a faca até a rodada 10.
description.german: Überlebe nur mit dem Messer bis Runde 10.

description.english: Upgrade a weapon.
description.spanish: Mejora un arma.
description.russian: Улучшай оружие.
description.french: Améliorez une arme.
description.portuguese: Melhora uma arma.
description.brazilian: Melhore uma arma.
description.german: Verbessere eine Waffe.

displayName.english: Doesn't it smell weird in here?
displayName.spanish: No huele un poco raro aquí?
displayName.russian: Тебе не кажется, что тут пахнет странно?
displayName.french: Ça ne sent pas un peu bizarre ici ?
displayName.brazilian: Não tá com um cheiro estranho aqui?

description.english: Have 4 perks active at once.
description.spanish: Ten cuatro ventajas a la vez.
description.russian: Активируй 4 перка одновременно.
description.french: Ayez 4 atouts actifs en même temps.
description.portuguese: Tem 4 buffs ativos ao mesmo tempo.
description.brazilian: Ative 4 perks ao mesmo tempo.
description.german: Aktiviere 4 Perks gleichzeitig.

description.english: Get the hidden song.
description.spanish: Activa la canción oculta.
description.russian: Найди скрытую песню.
description.french: Débloquez la chanson cachée.
description.portuguese: Descobre a música secreta.
description.brazilian: Descubra a música secreta.
description.german: Finde das versteckte Lied.

description.english: Get 1,000 headshots.
description.spanish: Consigue 1.000 tiros a la cabeza.
description.russian: Сделай 1000 выстрелов в голову.
description.french: Faites 1 000 tirs à la tête.
description.portuguese: Faz 1000 tiros na cabeça.
description.brazilian: Faça 1.000 tiros na cabeça.
description.german: Erziele 1.000 Kopfschüsse.

description.english: Kill 15 zombies with a single Zushi shot.
description.spanish: Mata a 15 zombies a la vez con un solo disparo de la Zushi.
description.russian: Убей 15 зомби одним выстрелом из Zushi.
description.french: Tuez 15 zombies avec un seul tir de Zushi.
description.portuguese: Mata 15 zombies com um único disparo de Zushi.
description.brazilian: Mate 15 zumbis com um único disparo de Zushi.
description.german: Töte 15 Zombies mit einem einzigen Zushi-Schuss.

description.english: Get a special weapon from the Liberty Wheel.
description.spanish: Consigue un arma especial de la Ruleta de la Libertad.
description.russian: Получай особое оружие из Колеса Свободы.
description.french: Obtenez une arme spéciale avec la Roue de la Liberté.
description.schinese: 在自由之轮中获得一把特殊武器。
description.portuguese: Obtém uma arma especial na Roda da Liberdade.
description.brazilian: Ganhe uma arma especial na Roda da Liberdade.
description.german: Erhalte eine Spezialwaffe aus dem Freiheitsrad.

description.english: Interact with the gramophone.
description.spanish: Interacciona con el gramófono.
description.russian: Взаимодействуй с граммофоном.
description.french: Interagissez avec le gramophone.
description.portuguese: Interage com o gramofone.
description.brazilian: Interaja com o gramofone.
description.german: Interagiere mit dem Grammophon.

description.english: Kill 500 zombies using only melee attacks.
description.spanish: Consigue 500 bajas con el cuchillo.
description.russian: Убей 500 зомби только в ближнем бою.
description.french: Tuez 500 zombies uniquement avec des attaques de mêlée.
description.portuguese: Mata 500 zombies apenas com ataques corpo-a-corpo.
description.brazilian: Mate 500 zumbis usando apenas ataques corpo a corpo.
description.german: Töte 500 Zombies nur mit Nahkampfangriffen.

description.english: Complete the first 10 rounds in under 12 minutes.
description.spanish: Llega a la ronda 10 en menos de 12 minutos.
description.russian: Пройди первые 10 волн за менее чем 12 минут.
description.french: Terminez les 10 premières manches en moins de 12 minutes.
description.portuguese: Completa as primeiras 10 rondas em menos de 12 minutos.
description.brazilian: Complete as 10 primeiras rodadas em menos de 12 minutos.
description.german: Schließe die ersten 10 Runden in unter 12 Minuten ab.

description.english: Kill 3 zombies with one sniper bullet.
description.spanish: Mata a 3 zombies de un solo disparo de francotirador.
description.russian: Убей 3 зомби одной пулей из снайперки.
description.french: Tuez 3 zombies avec une seule balle de sniper.
description.schinese: 用一发狙击子弹击杀3只僵尸。
description.portuguese: Mata 3 zombies com uma única bala de sniper.
description.brazilian: Mate 3 zumbis com uma única bala de sniper.
description.german: Töte 3 Zombies mit einer einzigen Sniper-Kugel.

description.english: Kill a zombie with a sniper without aiming.
description.spanish: Mata a un zombie sin apuntar con el francotirador.
description.russian: Убей зомби из снайперской винтовки без прицеливания.
description.french: Tuez un zombie au sniper sans viser.
description.schinese: 用狙击枪在不瞄准的情况下击杀一只僵尸。
description.portuguese: Mata um zombie com sniper sem usar mira.
description.brazilian: Mate um zumbi com sniper sem mirar.
description.german: Töte einen Zombie mit dem Sniper ohne zu zielen.

description.english: Die in round 1.
description.spanish: Muere en la ronda 1.
description.russian: Умри в 1-й волне.
description.french: Mourrez à la manche 1.
description.portuguese: Morre na ronda 1.
description.brazilian: Morra na rodada 1.
description.german: Stirb in Runde 1.

description.english: Keep a single zombie alive for more than 5 minutes.
description.spanish: Mantén con vida a un solo zombie durante más de 5 minutos.
description.russian: Оставь одного зомби в живых более чем на 5 минут.
description.french: Laissez un seul zombie en vie pendant plus de 5 minutes.
description.schinese: 让一只僵尸存活超过5分钟。
description.portuguese: Deixa um zombie vivo durante mais de 5 minutos.
description.brazilian: Deixe um zumbi vivo por mais de 5 minutos.
description.german: Lass einen Zombie über 5 Minuten am Leben.

displayName.spanish: No es campear, es una estrategia!
displayName.portuguese: Isto não é campismo, é tática!
displayName.german: Das ist kein Campen, das ist Taktik!

description.english: Stay in the same spot for 3 full rounds.
description.spanish: Mantente en la misma zona durante 3 rondas seguidas.
description.russian: Продержись в одной точке 3 полные волны.
description.french: Restez au même endroit pendant 3 manches complètes.
description.schinese: 在同一个位置坚持3个完整回合。
description.portuguese: Fica no mesmo sítio durante 3 rondas completas.
description.brazilian: Fique no mesmo lugar por 3 rodadas completas.
description.german: Bleibe 3 ganze Runden lang an derselben Stelle.

description.english: Get downed 3 times in a single round.
description.spanish: Cae 3 veces en una sola ronda.
description.russian: Падай 3 раза за одну волну.
description.french: Tombez à terre 3 fois en une seule manche.
description.portuguese: Fica no chão 3 vezes na mesma ronda.
description.brazilian: Cai 3 vezes em uma única rodada.
description.german: Geh in einer einzigen Runde 3-mal zu Boden.

description.english: Kill 10 zombies in a row using only headshots.
description.spanish: Consigue 10 disparos consecutivos a la cabeza.
description.russian: Убей 10 зомби подряд, стреляя только в голову.
description.french: Tuez 10 zombies d’affilée uniquement avec des tirs à la tête.
description.portuguese: Mata 10 zombies seguidos só com tiros na cabeça.
description.brazilian: Mate 10 zumbis seguidos só com tiros na cabeça.
description.german: Töte 10 Zombies hintereinander nur mit Kopfschüssen.

description.english: Die by your own combustion shot.
description.spanish: Muere por tu propio disparo de la Combustion.
description.russian: Умри от собственного выстрела с огненным уроном.
description.french: Mourez à cause de votre propre tir explosif.
description.portuguese: Morre com o teu próprio disparo de combustão.
description.brazilian: Morra com seu próprio tiro de combustão.
description.german: Stirb durch deinen eigenen Verbrennungsschuss.

description.english: Kill 10 zombies with the shotgun in under 10 seconds.
description.spanish: Mata a 10 zombies con la escopeta en menos de 10 segundos.
description.russian: Убей 10 зомби из дробовика за 10 секунд.
description.french: Tuez 10 zombies avec le fusil à pompe en moins de 10 secondes.
description.schinese: 在10秒内用霰弹枪击杀10只僵尸。
description.portuguese: Mata 10 zombies com a caçadeira em menos de 10 segundos.
description.brazilian: Mate 10 zumbis com a escopeta em menos de 10 segundos.
description.german: Töte 10 Zombies mit der Schrotflinte in unter 10 Sekunden.

displayName.brazilian: Reanima aí, tô com as duas!
displayName.german: Beleb mich wieder, ich hab beide!

description.english: Have the Zushi gun and Combustion gun at the same time.
description.spanish: Ten las armas Zushi y Combustion al mismo tiempo.
description.russian: Имей оружия Zushi и Combustion одновременно.
description.french: Ayez les armes Zushi et Combustion en même temps.
description.portuguese: Tem as armas Zushi e Combustion ao mesmo tempo.
description.brazilian: Tenha as armas Zushi e Combustion ao mesmo tempo.
description.german: Habe gleichzeitig die Zushi- und Combustion-Waffe.

description.english: Spend 1,000,000 points. No prenup.
description.french: Dépensez 1 000 000 de points. Pas de contrat, hein.
description.spanish: Gasta 1.000.000 de puntos. Sin separación de bienes.
description.schinese: 花费1,000,000点数。别指望有婚前协议。
description.russian: Потрать 1 000 000 очков.
description.portuguese: Gasta 1 000 000 pontos. Sem contrato pré-nupcial.
description.brazilian: Gaste 1.000.000 de pontos.
description.german: Gib 1.000.000 Punkte aus. Kein Ehevertrag nötig.

description.english: Complete the main easter egg from "La Cabaña".
description.spanish: Completa el easter egg principal de "La Cabaña".
description.russian: Заверши главное пасхальное задание на «La Cabaña».
description.french: Terminez l’easter egg principal de « La Cabaña ».
description.portuguese: Conclui o easter egg principal de «La Cabaña».
description.brazilian: Complete o easter egg principal de 'La Cabaña'.
description.german: Beende das Haupteasteregg von „La Cabaña“.

description.english: Open all the doors from "La Cabaña".
description.spanish: Abre todas las puertas de "La Cabaña".
description.russian: Открой все двери на карте «La Cabaña».
description.french: Ouvrez toutes les portes dans « La Cabaña ».
description.schinese: 打开“La Cabaña”地图的所有门。
description.portuguese: Abre todas as portas em «La Cabaña».
description.brazilian: Abra todas as portas em 'La Cabaña'.
description.german: Öffne alle Türen auf der Karte „La Cabaña“.

description.english: Kill a total of 11,500 zombies.
description.spanish: Mata un total de 11.500 zombis.
description.russian: Убей в сумме 11 500 зомби.
description.french: Tuez un total de 11 500 zombies.
description.portuguese: Mata um total de 11 500 zombies.
description.brazilian: Mate um total de 11.500 zumbis.
description.german: Töte insgesamt 11.500 Zombies.
